Name: Reef Juice
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: The Reef takes no prisoners! Tangy, fruity, and dangerously moreish.
History: Charles Tobias, the original proprietor of Pusser's Rum , created this cocktail at the Beach Bar in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. It was a favourite of a friend who crashed his boat on a reef.
Nutrition: One serving of Reef Juice contains 350 calories
